titleStmt.title: Edward Morgan, a priest, his letter to the Kings most excellent Majesty, and high court of Parliament and to all the Commons of England who was drawne, hanged, and quartered on Tuesday April 26, 1642 : this letter he writ with his owne hand a little before his death and left yet to be published to the view of the world.
titleStmt.author: Morgan, Edward, d. 1642.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
